title: [Bug]: Cross thread access to the static dictionary
body:
Updating properties of the static class could be accessed from different threads which could cause corruptions:
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/b0e2b79230019c8f28ad7bedd82ecaa85a114761/src/Build/BackEnd/BuildManager/BuildManager.cs#L580

nodes.body: Closing since the PR got merged already.
